name: campbell soup fighter
description:
made for paint jam 2021

i did all of the challenges

this means my game is made in ms paint, all the sound effects are made with my mouth, it only used the default pallete, its 3d but only using flat images, uses comic sans as a font, all the assets are drawn without a drawing tablet (i dont use one normally), my title doesnt use a font, all the art is drawn with my eyes closed, i only use the pencil tool, and theres no transparency.
